Query.Sql: with results as ( select distinct (select PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer limit 1) as NhsNumber, dc.DiagnosisCode, dc.DateStamp, from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc where dc.DiagnosisCode like 'Referral%' ) select NhsNumber, DateStamp from results where NhsNumber is not null and regexp_matches(NhsNumber, '\d{10}');
